tool_description: Classifies the sentiment of customer reviews with confidence scores and identifies emotional tone to guide response strategy.

review_text.description: Customer review text to classify for sentiment

include_emotions.description: Whether to include detailed emotion analysis beyond basic sentiment

error_messages: Empty review text: Provide non-empty review_text parameter for sentiment analysis.
Text too short: Review text must contain at least 10 characters for meaningful sentiment analysis.
Text too long: Review text must be under 5000 characters for efficient processing.
usage: Provide review_text parameter with the customer review content. Set include_emotions to false if you only need basic positive/negative/neutral classification. The tool returns sentiment scores and emotional indicators.

primary_sentiment.description: Main sentiment classification: positive, negative, or neutral

sentiment_confidence.description: Confidence score for primary sentiment classification (0-1 scale)

positive_score.description: Probability score for positive sentiment (0-1 scale)

negative_score.description: Probability score for negative sentiment (0-1 scale)

neutral_score.description: Probability score for neutral sentiment (0-1 scale)

detected_emotions.description: Specific emotions detected in the review text
